snippet.title: [PC/PC98] [RTS] Lord Monarch Online Gameplay 1
snippet.description:
Hello everyone, this is Anyon175. 

This is a gameplay video of the game Lord Monarch Online, which is part of the Lord Monarch series by Nihon Falcom.

Below is the text file that came along with the game. 

Lord Monarch Online

Thank you for download "Lord Monarch Online". "Lord Monarch" is a game where you must think up a strategy to use as few days as possible to efficiently defeat the other countries by gaining as much territory as possible. In order to master Lord Monarch, you must use your wits to the fullest. 
The "Lord Monarch" series is the game on the Japanese Market. (We are Japanese game company.) However, this "Lord Monarch Online" is available exclusively by downloading and is not the limited edition. Enjoy !


**SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS**
OS: Windows 95
CPU: Pentium/486SX/33MHz or better
Memory requirements: 8MB or more
Free hard disk area: 4MB or more
Display: 640 x 480 resolution and 256 color capable
Sound: Windows 95 compatible PCM / MIDI (GM) 
Mouse required


(C) Nihon Falcom Corporation
http://www.falcom.com
http://www.falcom.co.jp 
Full of the information about NIHON FALCOM, a japanese RPG game company !
Cute screen savers, calendars, MIDI files, our licensing business informaiton are here !
